pages.text:
A tractor is a vehicle used in farming. The farm tractor is used for pulling or pushing agricultural 
machinery or trailers. It is also used for plowing, tilling, disking, harrowing, planting, and doing 
other similar tasks.

A tractor is basically a machine that provides machine power for performing agricultural tasks. Tractors can be used to pull a variety of farm equipments for plowing, planting, cultivating, fertilizing, and harvesting crops. It can also be used for pulling materials and personal transportation.

Within the first few decades, tractor was rarely used. Later the farmers realized the benefits of 
a tractor-driven farming. There was no need for human labor when a simple machine like a 
tractor could do the job for you. This saved lot of time and money. Isn't this a magical 
vehicle?

Initially the price of a tractor was very high. In just two years of its invention, the price dropped by nearly half. The tractor was an affordable tool of agricultural machinery for almost every farmer. This is because the production increased. The requirement and the sale was high. And hence it was sold at an affordable price. It can in fact be called as a farmer's friend.

Tractor, in agriculture is used to pull equipments such as plows, cultivators, and mowers. 
It is helpful to power stationary devices such as saws and winches.  Tractors are also used to 
push snowplows and earth-moving implements. Early tractors were steam-driven and now they 
are generally powered by gasoline or diesel engines. The two main types are wheeled tractors 
and caterpillar tractors, that move on treads.
